Title: Knight-Venator
Legend: Not even the mightiest adversaries can escape the vengeance of a Knight- Venator. Accompanied by their faithful Star-eagles, these winged hunters prowl the skies with incredible swiftness, loosing blessed arrows that unerringly seek their targets.
Intro: A Knight-Venator is armed with a Realmhunter’s Bow and Bowstave.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Lords of the Exemplar Chamber • Lords of the Harbinger Chamber • Lords of the Warrior Chamber

Rules.Name: Companion
Rules.Rule: COMPANION: This unit is accompanied by a Star-eagle armed with a Celestial Beak and Talons.

Rules.Name: Star-Fated Arrow
Rules.Fluff: Whispering the name of a powerful foe, the Knight-Venator looses an arrow destined to end that enemy's life.
Rules.Rule: Star-fated Arrow: Once per battle, in your shooting phase, you can say that this unit will shoot a star-fated arrow instead of attacking with its missile weapons. If you do so, pick 1 enemy unit within 30" of this unit and roll a dice. On a 3+, the target suffers D3 mortal wounds. If the target is a HERO or MONSTER, it suffers D6 mortal wounds instead of D3.
